data.name: The Forgotten City Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The complete official soundtrack of The Forgotten City. Listen to Composer Michael Allen's stunning 30-track orchestral score, and experience the wonder, beauty, and joy of your journey into the past all over again.


Total length: 1 hour 17 minutes
